tables.name: pacific_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains various attributes of events from the cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into the transaction and block-level data.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the EVM-compatible blockchain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hash identifying a specific transaction in the blockchain

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index to uniquely identify an event within a transaction

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event triggered by a transaction or block

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: Source of the event in the blockchain ecosystem

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Key of an attribute or parameter in an event or transaction

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Value associated with an attribute or parameter

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Index to access an attribute within an event or transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when the data is ingested from the blockchain

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when a block is generated in the blockchain

tables.name: pacific_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table contains a detailed view of blockchain events in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing attributes about each event occurrence. The attributes are gathered from a variety of blockchain sources.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Sequence number of the block within the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for a Cosmos network

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Hash or unique identifier for a blockchain transaction

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within a transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: Index of the event within a message

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: Type of event occurring within a message

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: Key for an attribute within an event

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: Value for an attribute within an event

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: Index of the attribute within an event

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system
